title: Willie-Washer's Local No. 38
description: Saloman Khash is trapped in the strict class system of Eng. He dreams of riding the wild boars of Bannock Brier to battle or scoring a major endorsement contract.Fate intervenes when Eng is invaded by the Ug-Slugs. Saloman embarks on a desperate quest, and learns fame and adventure come at a cost.
author: James D. Shipman
